query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS checklist_items (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  tripId INT NOT NULL,
  title VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  category ENUM('documents', 'bookings', 'packing', 'health', 'finance', 'other') NOT NULL,
  completed BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE NOT NULL,
  dueDate BIGINT,
  notes TEXT,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2cdS9hyY6XNQUTe.root --database 2rtwtAqF2DqhH9oEcii9XY --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS checklist_items (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  tripId INT NOT NULL,
  title VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  category ENUM('documents', 'bookings', 'packing', 'health', 'finance', 'other') NOT NULL,
  completed BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE NOT NULL,
  dueDate BIGINT,
  notes TEXT,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);
